summary: An American businessman in Scotland is conned into shipping a valuable load of cargo to a Scottish island via a coal powered boat.
cast: Paul Douglas|Alex Mackenzie|James Copeland|Abe Barker|Tommy Kearins|Hubert Gregg|Geoffrey Keen|Dorothy Alison|Andrew Keir|Meg Buchanan|Mark Dignam|Jameson Clark|Moultrie Kelsall|Fiona Clyne|Sheila Shand Gibbs|Betty Henderson|Russell Waters|Duncan McIntyre|Roddy McMillan|Jack Macguire|John Rae|Jack Stewart|Eric Woodburn|Douglas Robin|R.B. Wharrie|David Cameron|Catherine Fletcher|William Crichton|Andrew Downie|Herbert Cameron|Gilbert Stevenson|John Horsley
title: La bella Maggie
